title: John Downe 1830 Letter to his Wife

content.question: Write an essay that analyzes the rhetorical choices Downe makes to achieve his purpose of convincing his wife to emigrate to the United States.

frqParts.text: Write an essay that analyzes the rhetorical choices Downe makes to achieve his purpose of convincing his wife to emigrate to the United States.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
